results.title: Impact of hyperglycemia and treatment with metformin on ligature-induced bone loss, bone repair and expression of bone metabolism transcription factors
results.text_hl: On the 69th, the @<m>DISEASE_Tooth_Nonvital</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019553 @@@TNH@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Tooth_Nonvital</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019553 @@@TNH@@@-L, @<m>DISEASE_Tooth_Nonvital</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019553 @@@TH@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Tooth_Nonvital</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019553 @@@TH@@@-L groups received @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ until the end of the study.
